summary: Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Sreejith Ravi|Vijayaraghavan|Suresh Krishna|Mia George|Meghana Raj|Rahul Madhav|S.P. Sreekumar|Nedumudi Venu|Vanitha Krishnachandran|Shereej K. Basheer|Irshad|Disney James|Madhupal|Murugan|Narayanan Nair|Seema G. Nair|Rishi Prakash|Praveena|Jijoy Rajagopalan|Balaji Sarma|Baiju V.K.
title: Memories
